member_organisations: WMP EUrocom AG | WMP Finanzkommunikation GmbH | WMP Healthcare GmbH | GPA German Public Affairs GmbH |

Landwirtschaft, insbesondere die Reform der GAP 
Wirtschaft- und Währung, Finanzpolitik

section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: WMP EuroCom is one of Germany´s leading independent communication consultancies. It serves as advisor and facilitator in the field of government relations and as partner for companies and organizations in the representation of their interests towards the public sector. Our consultants advise companies, organizations and national governments on the growing complexity of the EU decision-making structure and legislative procedures.
